Hey @aparnacoronasafe @rithviknishad i am going through the issue i think this message would be correct **Dear Dr. B,

I trust this message finds you well. I am writing to seek your professional consultation regarding a patient under my care named patient_name. Patient [patient_name] is currently being treated for [disease_name]. I am attaching relevant medical records, test results, and any other important information for your review.
Your insights and recommendations would be highly valued in ensuring the best possible care for Patient. Please let me know a convenient time for you to discuss this case further or if you require any additional information.
patient_details: [patient_details]**

activity.title: ohcnetwork/ayushma_fe#186
activity.text:
> > Hiii @Ashesh3 just want a quick review I have used react-csv-reader for reading the data from csv currently the UI is looking like this I will change to look more better ![Screenshot 2024-03-04 180626](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/98794736/309755722-e9eb3434-a85e-4532-86e0-2e5c5e14f0bf.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..lObAoWVq9kRrCI0thtTO6xfw840JcNJB-B6U_PcyeXE) So when we click choose file and select a csv if the csv contains headers like question,human_answer,language then only it proceeds with the csv else it says upload correct csv and if the csv is correct it uses handleAddQuestion function in a loop untill all the data from csv is completed. I have also implemented checks in between so if there is a row which does not contains any of the details like question or human_answer or language it simply does not add that data as well this helps in stopping the missing values to enter is this approach correct??? please give suggestions......
> 
> Approach sounds good, let's get the design ready now!

one more query like if the api fails to upload a question, what does it return because while running a loop it may be possible that at some point or due to network, api may get fail so that's why i am asking

activity.title: ohcnetwork/ayushma_fe#186
activity.text:
Hiii @Ashesh3 
just want a quick review 
I have used react-csv-reader for reading the data from csv 
currently the UI is looking like this
I will change to look more better
![Screenshot 2024-03-04 180626](https://github.com/ohcnetwork/ayushma_fe/assets/98794736/e9eb3434-a85e-4532-86e0-2e5c5e14f0bf)
So when we click choose file and select a csv if the csv contains headers like question,human_answer,language then only it proceeds with the csv else it says upload correct csv and if the csv is correct it uses handleAddQuestion function in a loop untill all the data from csv is completed. I have also implemented checks in between so if there is a row which does not contains any of the details like question or human_answer or language it simply does not add that data as well this helps in stopping the missing values to enter is this approach correct??? please give suggestions......
